definition: content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc

sentences.english: Angel did not like being hit - who does?
sentences.chinese: 安琪儿不想被打，谁又愿意呢？

sentences.english: Duke is out shopping with his wife, Angel.
sentences.chinese: 杜克在外面陪他太太安琪儿购物。

sentences.english: Mum. Is it okay if Angela sleeps over tonight?
sentences.chinese: 妈妈。如果今晚安琪儿在此过夜可以吗？

sentences.english: A ngel never understood why her mother became angry so suddenly.
sentences.chinese: 安琪儿从来不明白为什么妈妈会突然生气。

sentences.english: You're my Angel that was sent to earth.
sentences.chinese: 你是派到地球上的，我的安琪儿。

definition: Nana (name)/Nana (1880 novel by Émile Zola)/Nana (Japanese manga series)
(phonetic na)/used esp. in female names such as Anna 安娜[An1 na4] or Diana 黛安娜[Dai4 an1 na4]
Hailun county level city in Suihua 綏化|绥化, Heilongjiang/Helen or Hélène (name)
